root.name: The Godfather: The Don's Edition
root.description: The Don's Edition is the PS3's exclusive game which feature some extras from the original version. In the game you create your own character and go on a journey to be the don of New York City and to avenge your father's death. You can collect many weapons along the game, including T.N.T and you can customize your character how ever you want. The game has free roaming much like games like GTA4 . On your way to becoming the don you do missions from many other Corleons including many from the movies (like Sonny) and killing other members other families.
